headline: Here’s What Drove Diamond Hill Small-Mid Cap Strategy to Initiate a Position in Generac Holdings (GNRC)
summary: Diamond Hill Capital, an investment management company, released its “Small-Mid Cap Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In Q2, the market surged uniformly for the rest of the quarter following a sharp decline in April due to President Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariffs announcement. The portfolio returned 5.60% […]
